publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5476 Bill Butler: Terry’s Top of the Table.—That the Parliament congratulates Terry McLernon of Drumchapel Table Tennis Club (DTTC) on being awarded an MBE in the New Year’s Honours list; acknowledges his unstinting efforts on behalf of both DTTC and the sport in Scotland over the last 20 years; recognises the remarkable impact that he has made on the community of Drumchapel and the manner in which he has turned DTTC into one of Scotland’s most successful sporting clubs, and wishes all involved with DTTC continued success in the years ahead.
